data.actual_result: The scroll bar is visible until you stop moving the scroller
data.expected_result: No scroll bar should be visible while opening the scroller
data.short_description: Channel list scroll bar visible while opening channel/server list by swiping right
data.steps_to_repro: - Slowly open the channel/server list by SWIPING right (not clicking the button in the top right) - Observe the scroll bar that disappears when you stop moving the list - Fully open the scroller - Scroll to a different position on the channel list - Close the scroller and repeat steps 1&2
